content.question: Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="v sub P" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>v</mi> <mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi> </msub> </math> and <math alttext="v sub Q" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub P is greater than v sub Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>P</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Q</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="v sub P is less than v sub Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>P</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Q</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub P equals v sub Q, close parenthesis, is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>P</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Q</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub P equals v sub Q, which equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>P</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Q</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub P is greater than v sub Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>P</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Q</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
